about_the_game:
In the game “Sparky: Hills of Death” recently deVeloped by Hito Corporation, players are Immersed in a dark universe designed by Sam Wills. The protagonist Sparky, Comes to life in a sinisTer way transcending the bOundaries between Reality and the game.

Zac a virtual security expert, finds himself immersed in this nightmare, while Marina his girlfriend, observes peculiar events in the real world related to the game.

The distinction between the virtual and the real disappears, leading players to a startling experience in which they must unravel enigmas, confront their fears and uncover the mysteries hidden in the Hills of Death. The horror tangibly materializes in 2024.

Control the Character with the WASD keys on your keyboard and using the Mouse to move the camera, you must escape the location while there are enemies behind you, as the game progresses, look for items to survive, such as flashlights with batteries, places to stay hidden and much more!


CHAPTER 1 - Virus awakened

In this first part of the story, Zac tests a mysterious game developed by Hito Corporation. The game, apparently defective, is gradually taken over by a virus that corrupts the entire system! Sparky the monster escapes his digital prison once again. Zac then finds himself trapped in illusions controlled by Sparky and must find a way to escape this dark trap!

  • Explore the offices where Spaky rules

  • Run to survive

  • Use scene items to defend yourself or hide

  • Sparky is waiting for you...

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 7020U 2.30GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hito Corporation immerses players in a dark universe where the monster, Sparky, comes to life in a sinister way, blurring the boundaries between reality and game. While cyber security expert Zac and his girlfriend Marina face strange events both in the game and in real life.
